resources.string:
Voluntarily harming the privacy of another's privacy, by capturing, recording or transmitting, by any means, without the consent of the author, words or phrases, may be punished by a fine and / or imprisonment. 

Where the acts referred to above have been carried out in the eyes of the persons concerned without their having objected to them, when they were in a position to do so, their consent may be presumed. 

Carry, or allow the public or any third party to use, or use in any way, any record, or document obtained by means of any of the acts mentioned above, may be punished by the same sentences. 

Where the offense is committed by means of the written or audiovisual press, the special provisions of the laws governing these matters shall apply as regards the determination of the persons responsible. 

Please check the applicable laws in your country / state before registering telephone conversations with this software.

This option defines the source of the audio stream to be recorded. \nAudio source :
This option sets the audio format of records. \nAudio format :
This option allows you to configure the display of the audio spectrum during replay. \nMode :
This option sets the record storage directory. \nStorage directory :
This option enables the purge of obsolete records.
This option sets the purge frequency of obsolete records. \nFrequency of service :
This option sets the retention time for records. \nRetention time :
This option enables logging of internal software events.
This option triggers a sound for each new notification.
This option triggers a vibration for each new notification.
This option enables the LED for each new notification.
This option activates information messages that appear on the screen.
This option is used to define the language to be used in the software. \nLanguage :
This option allows you to define the theme of the software. \nTheme :
This option allows you to define the theme color to be used in the software. \nCouleur :
This option enables the splash screen when the software is launched.
